content: अप्रकृत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not principal or chief, incidental, occasional. {@--2@} Not relevant to the subject under discussion, not to the point, irrelevant; see प्रकृत, प्रस्तुत; अप्रकृतं अनुसंधा ‘to beat about the bush’, not to come to the point. --तं (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) उपमान {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the standard of comparison (<ab>opp.</ab> प्रकृत or उपमेय).
